TopicTitle: Little Speeder - Just fixing broken wheels.

Articles.Content:
Okay, so how is the [Speeder](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124707-The-little-Speeder-atmospheric-entry-in-a-seat/page2) doing on Minmus?

Here's the general situation:

One of the trucks from the mining operation has been sent to meet the Jumping Laboratory after their next jump, to refuel them.

![KkV4ILy.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/KkV4ILy.jpg)

![e6ma7In.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/e6ma7In.jpg)

It grounded a little too hard though (they are really designed to land almost empty, offload fuel in orbit) and busted two wheels.

![ugU2Yn8.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ugU2Yn8.jpg)

So, back at the mine, Gregar (is that a Viking name or what?) decides to go fix it. Not that it couldn't return on its own, but hey, an excuse to use the speeder!

![6GWvcBo.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6GWvcBo.jpg)

And here's Gregar's personal speeder, accessorized with an external fuel tank.

![sKYRQtX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sKYRQtX.jpg)

Gregar takes a leap of faith...

![XrJyLgq.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XrJyLgq.jpg)

Boarding the speeder...

![3UOsK2f.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/3UOsK2f.jpg)

And off we go!

![AWBvHq9.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/AWBvHq9.jpg)

![OHrbuRd.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/OHrbuRd.jpg)

![pUjDZR4.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/pUjDZR4.jpg)

![Ph7qR6K.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Ph7qR6K.jpg)![emBNyOH.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/emBNyOH.jpg)

First refuelling from the external tank, not really necessary but you know how it goes...

![2Z5P68M.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2Z5P68M.jpg)

About to cross the crest...

![QbFgt6x.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/QbFgt6x.jpg)![rTL2mYX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/rTL2mYX.jpg)

Aaaand the target is in sight.

![XSdUYiZ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XSdUYiZ.jpg)

Braking.

![JXvcn4B.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/JXvcn4B.jpg)

![UcFWzcL.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/UcFWzcL.jpg)

Using up last of my monopropellant on soft landing. I had barely any when starting.

![QDlIp9V.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/QDlIp9V.jpg)

![V6ILKk5.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/V6ILKk5.jpg)

![KB1wJpW.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/KB1wJpW.jpg)![vmxk6Ut.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/vmxk6Ut.jpg)

![uES1VPa.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/uES1VPa.jpg)

We're running short on fuel. We should drop into the garage on our way back to refuel...

![aaj5wed.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/aaj5wed.jpg)

![zgCExcQ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/zgCExcQ.jpg)

![vIX09D8.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/vIX09D8.jpg)

The garage is located about 3km from the mining operations, for the simple reasons of keeping the framerate of these two high.

![F7mGKJ6.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/F7mGKJ6.jpg)

With monoprop, I'd land right in front of the garage, but running just on the main engine, I really don't feel like struggling with that.

![uBN02Fj.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/uBN02Fj.jpg)

The landing was pretty hard, but nothing the skids wouldn't withstand...

![LEw4d0O.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/LEw4d0O.jpg)![DDcJIDy.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/DDcJIDy.jpg)

Too bad the solar panels aren't skids. Seems I busted one. And in the background - 8 more speeders, awaiting assignment.

RCS is gone but the reaction wheel still works.
